title: LF for top laner for flex
body: anyone can join with any rank just need someone to chill with the boi's

replies.body: Maybe it's an ad, but take a look! Im doing daily Katarina content (plus other champs!) Customs skins and montages/gameplay! You should take a look if you love daily League content. Maybe you'll love it! :yum:  https://www.youtube.com/c/MihuKat
Add me my dude. @CharminCharizard. Down to merk some scrubs.
Hell yeh bro I'll add ya
